Description:
Are you a creative and organized individual with a passion for influencer marketing?Do you thrive in a fast-paced environment and have a knack for building and nurturing relationships? If so, we want you to be a part of our team!As a Project-Based Influencer Account Manager at Trendster, you will play a crucial role in our influencer marketing campaigns. You will work closely with our clients to understand their goals, identify the right influencers, and manage influencer partnerships from start to finish. This is a project-based position, making it perfect for those who enjoy the flexibility of freelancing while being a part of a dynamic Team.Key Responsibilities:Collaborate with clients to understand their objectives and develop influencer marketing strategies.
Identify and recruit the most suitable influencers for each campaign.
Negotiate contracts and manage relationships with influencers.
Develop and execute influencer marketing campaigns, ensuring they align with client goals and brand guidelines.
Monitor campaign performance and make data-driven recommendations for optimization.
Provide regular updates and reports to clients on campaign progress.
Stay up-to-date with industry trends and emerging influencers.Skills
Skills:
Experience working with influencers or marketing related field.
Strong understanding of social media platforms and influencer trends.
Excellent communication and negotiation skills.
Highly organized and able to manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Creative thinker with a knack for developing innovative influencer strategies.
Proficiency in influencer marketing tools and platforms is a plus.
Bachelor's degree in marketing, communications, or a related field is preferred.
